name: Human Sacrifice [Jade]
content: I say come on come on
And I gave you everything and still
I let you break my wings chose
To become your caged up bird
Here is my vindication hey you
Let's go back into the time
You stained my heart like Merlot wine
Didn't care if I was sick
You left me alone to cry and die
I did not forget get get get get
Back with a bazooka and a bullet
Here I come for you hey you
When you promised me the perfect love
Put me on my knees and blamed it on me
I let you break my wings chose
To become your caged up bird
Here is my vindication hey you
When you promised me the perfect love
Put me on my knees and blamed it on me
When you promised me the perfect love
Put me on my knees and blamed it on me
